MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Ferguson Lake Project in North America dated May 2007

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Ferguson Lake Project in North America dated May 2007
document.description: The document is titled 'A contribution to the geology of the Ferguson Lake Intrusive Complex (FLIC): A metamorphosed Archean Cu-Ni-PGE bearing leucocratic to melanocratic mafic-ultramafic layered complex', addressing the geology of the Ferguson Lake Intrusive Complex in the Western Churchill Province.
